title: Vampire Hunter (Night Warriors: Darkstalkers' Revenge)
synopsis: The world is a dark, brooding place populated by humans, but ruled in reality by powerful beings known as the Darkstalkers, and there is constant conflict between them as they try to determine who is the most powerful of them all. Zombies, vampires, werewolves - all of them compete in contests of strength and sheer will to attain their own personal goals.
voices: ['Sakuma, Rei', 'Yukana', 'Ootsuka, Akio', 'Ishizuka, Unshou', 'Ogawa, Shinji', 'Yajima, Akiko', 'Tachiki, Fumihiko', 'Miyamura, Yuko', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Iizuka, Shouzou']
staff: [['Ikeda, Masashi', ['Director']], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Tanaka, Hiroyuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Imaishi, Hiroyuki', ['Key Animation']]]
